tls:text.tls:line: this is given only to the superior person!”

sense.def: (presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: and he may be said to kept his distance from meting out punishments and honorary titles.

sense.def: application of punishments and honorary titles

tls:text.tls:line: when outside one will show brotherly respect,

sense.def: show brotherly-affection-style care for the local people

tls:text.tls:line: and he never passed judgment, positive or negative, on others.

sense.def: any individuals; human individuals; person (as having it's own features)

"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles

"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective
如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective
子期似王"Ziqi resembled the king": look like; be similar in appearance
adapt to the prevailing dynamics of the situation

seg.line: 天其或者將啟堯舜之運

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天其或者將啟堯舜之運
tls:text.tls:line: Maybe Heaven will open up for a new turn as from Yáo and Shùn

sense.def: probably; in all likelihood; for all we know

tls:text.tls:line: That is surely a profound point!
weren’t they profound!
that must count as the most admirable.”
the superior person would cease to entertain these hopes (for a late revival of an imperial administrative system).
and the petty man hopes for his (kind of) generous treatment (as evidenced in WT’s actions).
The Master travelled to a temple to Confucius.

seg.line: 越公以《食經》遺子，子不受。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 越公以《食經》遺子，子不受。
tls:text.tls:line: When Yuègōng (i.e. 楊素) presented his "Classic of Eating" to the Master, and the Master would not accept it, 【The reference to the leading disciple 楊素 in this way imitates the archaic ways of personal reference in the Analects that does persist in Suí dynasty times.】

the capital resources in it are bound to be thereby ***reduced.” 【TW finds an aspect that might advise against Confucian leniency. The second point is thoughtful and original, but one is unsure how the point fits into the context.

“If Dù Rúhuì 杜如晦 (AD 585-630, served under the Suí, then senior minister in the early Táng administration, often mentioned together with Fāng Yuánlíng 房元齡, famous scholar official who in the end failed to play any important role) had met ***the right enlightened king

“If Dù Rúhuì 杜如晦 (AD 585-630, served under the Suí, then senior minister in the early Táng administration, often mentioned together with Fāng Yuánlíng 房元齡, famous scholar official who in the end failed to play any important role) had met ***the right enlightened king

sense.def: 其人"the right person": the right N; the right kind of N, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable

tls:text.tls:line: then in the eyes of the the common people he would surely have become 'like Heaven’!”
Are you going to destroy the ‘tradition of moral decency’?”
He treated other people’s orphans like his own.” (己 npro(.adN))

seg.line: 士有靡衣鮮食而樂道者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 士有靡衣鮮食而樂道者，
tls:text.tls:line: “For a scholar who wears fine clothes and eats rare dishes, for him then to take delight in the Way,
Those ***who dote on the misfortune (of others) and yearn for (other people’s) disaster 【The reduplicated Chinese notion of Schadenfreude is interesting and important here.】

sense.def: longing for the misfortune of others; Schadenfreude

tls:text.tls:line: and moreover this is the public duty of an ordinary person.
“Our Master transmits ***and creates the Great Moral Truth.
that is to be a person of the superior man type.”

sense.def: gentlemanly, of the gentlemanly type 女為君子儒

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the superior man type.”

sense.def: characteristic of a true gentleman; in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

tls:text.tls:line: were what was the eccentric kind in ancient times:
then they will say: ‘He still is our ruler.

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: then they will say: ‘He is beyond the pale.

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: “This proper practice
“Despising other creatures/people and setting high store by oneself
Surely you speak with two tongues.”

sense.def: speak with two tongues; be dishonest; be hypocritical

tls:text.tls:line: “What Wèi Zhēng asked about are the external symptoms,
came to make things worse by pushing the waves to add to the flood:
but their concrete practice was deceitful.

sense.def: behaviour in the past; record of actions in the past

tls:text.tls:line: but their concrete practice was deceitful.
“When kept at a distance not to get standoffish,
“When kept at a distance not to get standoffish,
What about that kind of behaviour?”

sense.def: what about that? What do you think about that (the preceding, contextually determinate)?

tls:text.tls:line: “What is the point?”

sense.def: (often followed by 也：What is the point?

tls:text.tls:line: these were the means by which one followed Heaven and paid homage to decreed fate.”
these were the means by which one followed Heaven and paid homage to decreed fate.”
nor does he pray for pointless good fortune
nor does he pray for pointless good fortune
